name: Junior High
description: Grades 6, 7, and 8 the Junior High program is designed to prepare students for a successful high school experience. Our departmentalized program allows each instructor to teach in his or her area of strength. Junior High instructors are specialized in: math, history, science, language arts and religion. Students are assigned a homeroom teacher and rotate through the Junior High classrooms to attend their daily classes.
